casebody.data:
Morrison, Respondent, v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co., Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 4, 1890.) Appeal from trial term. Action by Robert Morrison against the Metropolitan Railway Company.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Freedman, J.

Davies & Sapallo, for appellant. Calvin & Break, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
